tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Bharat Reddy is exceptional in his expertise . Very skilful and great in work ethics. Caring, understands my anxiety of the treatment and speaks to me accordingly to make me comfortable during the procedures. His team if doctors really Very gentle ,in handling and they keep asking me inbetween if  I am  comfortable!. Even the tools handling assistant ls were smiling ta the eye contact. Kept my anxiety at bay . Every one worked professionally from the  word Go.This is my repeated experience every time I went. Coming to the equipment. Every thing looks state of the art, ( I don't know the technically advanced names for which I saw ) .Clinic is spacious and aesthetically done. I didn't get a feeling that I have entered in to a hospital.But some well-done launge base. You just have to see to believe my words about everything I experienced.. Last but not the least , I found that, even though I got this good treatment, my treatment was affordable. I recommend already to my friends and families. Cause of the good experience. My heart felt thanks and best wishes to Dr. Bharat Reddy garu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
To start with Dr Bharat is an extremely experienced dentist who understands any kind of dental problem very well and gives you the right advice for your dental problem. I should say he is very good with the hand work, especially with RCTs. He takes utmost good care of your teeth. You don't even have the sense of treatment or any kind of pain while he is treating us or after treating us. He charges less compared to every doctor in that area and infact i would say within Hyderabad as i had gone to many dentists for my problem and found the best solution from him with a reasonable charges. Most of all he has lots of patience to deal with a patient.

Recommends him 100% to any one i know. Infact i had already recommended him to my friends and relatives as well.
